divs: Sighting DetailsMe and 5 Friends were star gazing in the back yard of our old elementary school trying to find constelations. When I saw what appeared to be a huge triangle in the sky. I pointed it out to every one and we were all amazed. Then I saw a faint light in the center so i pointed that out to them to and not a second after i said "hey look at the little light in the middle" the very faint light all of a sudden got real real bright and moved across a large portion of the sky from north to south in seconds and then came from an amazing speed to a dead stop. I look at my friends and we found each other speachless then looked back and watched it dissapear to nothing.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around August 20th 2006
Summary: I saw a faint light in the sky then it turned to a very bright white and flew north to south and in seconds it was gone
